author: gstein
msg: (load_ra_module): extra tweak to assist with debugging the load process.

author: cmpilato
msg: Create a new RA function (do_status) for more efficiently doing
status-y out-of-dateness checks than a regular update would do.
UPDATE_TARGET to TARGET, and UPDATE_BATON to EDIT_BATON.  Added
UPDATE_TARGET to TARGET, and UPDATE_BATON to EDIT_BATON.  Added
TEXT_DELTAS argument, which is stuffed into the report baton.
(do_update): Pass TRUE for text_deltas argument of
(ra_local_plugin): Added reference to new function, do_status().
(dav_svn__update_report): Pass FALSE for text_deltas argument of
(simple_fetch_file): Add TEXT_DELTAS argument, and only bother
fetching delta data if our caller passes the argument as TRUE.
(start_element, end_element): Use rb->is_status to determine what to
pass for TEXT_DELTAS argument of simple_fetch_file().  Also, don't
store version URLs during an update.
(dav_plugin): Add reference to new function svn_ra_dav__do_status().
